properties.Description: The set of properties specific to bot resource

location.Description: Specifies the location of the resource.

tags.Description: Contains resource tags defined as key/value pairs.

sku.Description: Gets or sets the SKU of the resource.

kind.Description: Required. Gets or sets the Kind of the resource.

iconUrl.Description: The Icon Url of the bot

msaAppId.Description: Microsoft App Id for the bot

configuredChannels.Description: Collection of channels for which the bot is configured

enabledChannels.Description: Collection of channels for which the bot is enabled

tier.Description: Gets the sku tier. This is based on the SKU name.

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to bot channel resource

location.Description: Specifies the location of the resource.

tags.Description: Contains resource tags defined as key/value pairs.

sku.Description: Gets or sets the SKU of the resource.

kind.Description: Required. Gets or sets the Kind of the resource.

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to Direct Line channel resource

sites.Description: The list of Direct Line sites

key.Description: Primary key. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

key2.Description: Secondary key. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

isEnabled.Description: Whether this site is enabled for DirectLine channel.

isV1Enabled.Description: Whether this site is enabled for Bot Framework V1 protocol.

isV3Enabled.Description: Whether this site is enabled for Bot Framework V1 protocol.

isSecureSiteEnabled.Description: Whether this site is enabled for authentication with Bot Framework.

trustedOrigins.Description: List of Trusted Origin URLs for this site. This field is applicable only if isSecureSiteEnabled is True.

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to email channel resource

password.Description: The password for the email address. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

isEnabled.Description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to bot facebook channel

verifyToken.Description: Verify token. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

appSecret.Description: Facebook application secret. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

isEnabled.Description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

accessToken.Description: Facebook application access token. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to Kik channel resource

apiKey.Description: Kik API key. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

isValidated.Description: Whether this channel is validated for the bot

isEnabled.Description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to Microsoft Teams channel resource

enableCalling.Description: Enable calling for Microsoft Teams channel

callingWebHook.Description: Webhook for Microsoft Teams channel calls

isEnabled.Description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to Skype channel resource

enableMediaCards.Description: Enable media cards for Skype channel

enableScreenSharing.Description: Enable screen sharing for Skype channel

callingWebHook.Description: Calling web hook for Skype channel

isEnabled.Description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to Slack channel resource

clientSecret.Description: The Slack client secret. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

verificationToken.Description: The Slack verification token. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

registerBeforeOAuthFlow.Description: Whether to register the settings before OAuth validation is performed. Recommended to True.

isValidated.Description: Whether this channel is validated for the bot

isEnabled.Description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to Sms channel resource

accountSID.Description: The Sms account SID. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

authToken.Description: The Sms auth token. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

isValidated.Description: Whether this channel is validated for the bot

isEnabled.Description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to Telegram channel resource

accessToken.Description: The Telegram access token. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

isValidated.Description: Whether this channel is validated for the bot

isEnabled.Description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to Web Chat channel resource

sites.Description: The list of Web Chat sites

key.Description: Primary key. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

key2.Description: Secondary key. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

isEnabled.Description: Whether this site is enabled for DirectLine channel

enablePreview.Description: Whether this site is enabled for preview versions of Webchat

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to bot channel resource

location.Description: Specifies the location of the resource.

tags.Description: Contains resource tags defined as key/value pairs.

sku.Description: Gets or sets the SKU of the resource.

kind.Description: Required. Gets or sets the Kind of the resource.

clientId.Description: Client Id associated with the Connection Setting.

settingId.Description: Setting Id set by the service for the Connection Setting.

clientSecret.Description: Client Secret associated with the Connection Setting

scopes.Description: Scopes associated with the Connection Setting

serviceProviderId.Description: Service Provider Id associated with the Connection Setting

serviceProviderDisplayName.Description: Service Provider Display Name associated with the Connection Setting

parameters.Description: Service Provider Parameters associated with the Connection Setting

key.Description: Key for the Connection Setting Parameter.

value.Description: Value associated with the Connection Setting Parameter.

properties.Description: The set of properties specific to an Enterprise Channel resource.

location.Description: Specifies the location of the resource.

tags.Description: Contains resource tags defined as key/value pairs.

sku.Description: Gets or sets the SKU of the resource.

kind.Description: Required. Gets or sets the Kind of the resource.

state.Description: The current state of the Enterprise Channel.

nodes.Description: The nodes associated with the Enterprise Channel.

id.Description: Id of Enterprise Channel Node. This is generated by the Bot Framework.

state.Description: The current state of the Enterprise Channel Node.

name.Description: The name of the Enterprise Channel Node.

azureSku.Description: The sku of the Enterprise Channel Node.

azureLocation.Description: The location of the Enterprise Channel Node.
